img_above_text:
![Wukong YellowFlower 39.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5a/Wukong_YellowFlower_39.jpg)
The Fungiwoman can also expel toxic strands from its side to seek you out, but can thankfully by swept aside with a staff spin. The same can also happen if they slam their staff down, creating geysers that spawn additional projectiles.
img_below_text:
Like the Fungiman, this variant can fly through the air to slam down from above on you, only with this move they'll also create poison geysers all around them to spawn the aforementioned projectiles.
![Wukong YellowFlower 41.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f1/Wukong_YellowFlower_41.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 2 from the file 'Fungiwoman.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong YellowFlower 39.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5a/Wukong_YellowFlower_39.jpg)
The Fungiwoman can also expel toxic strands from its side to seek you out, but can thankfully by swept aside with a staff spin. The same can also happen if they slam their staff down, creating geysers that spawn additional projectiles."
            - Following Text: "Like the Fungiman, this variant can fly through the air to slam down from above on you, only with this move they'll also create poison geysers all around them to spawn the aforementioned projectiles.
![Wukong YellowFlower 41.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f1/Wukong_YellowFlower_41.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary:
1. **Summary of the Image:**  
The image depicts a combat encounter with the "Fungiwoman" in *Black Myth: Wukong*. The player character is engaged in battle against the creature, which appears to be emitting toxic projectiles or strands. The environment is a lush, forested area with rocky terrain and a small structure in the background. The health bar labeled "Fungiwoman" and various UI elements indicate an active fight sequence.

2. **Inferred Purpose/Narrative Role:**  
The image illustrates the Fungiwoman's toxic attack mechanics, as described in the preceding and following text. These include expelling poisonous strands and creating geysers that spawn projectiles, showcasing the creature's dangerous abilities and reinforcing the need for strategic combat.
